titles: Reasons for which the service booke, urged upon Scotland ought to bee refused
author: Gillespie, George, 1613-1648, attributed name.
notes: Place of publication and printer's name from STC; publication date from colophon.
This edition has A1r catchword: English.
Probably intended to be issued with STC 22026, but often found bound with STC 22030, 22056, and other items (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Episcopal Church in Scotland. --  Book of common prayer --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
